product_details.name: Insignia High-Efficiency Compact Ventless Dryer - Modern Laundry Solution
product_details.description:
• ✨ Sleek white design with modern digital display and intuitive controls
• 🔄 Multiple drying cycles including Normal, Heavy Duty, Delicate, and Quick Dry
• 📱 Digital LED display with time remaining indicator and cycle status
• 🌟 Energy-efficient ventless condensing technology
• 🎯 Precise moisture sensors for optimal drying results
• 🔧 Easy-access maintenance panel for simple upkeep
• 💨 Advanced airflow system with adjustable temperature settings
• 📏 Space-saving compact design perfect for apartments and small homes
• ⚙️ Large capacity drum with gentle tumbling action
• 🛡️ Durable construction with premium components for long-lasting performance
• 🌡️ Multiple temperature settings for various fabric types
• ⏰ Delay start feature for convenient scheduling

banner_details:
The banner showcases a sleek and modern product advertisement with a minimalistic aesthetic. The background features soft, wavy abstract shapes and circular forms in gentle shades of blue that add movement and freshness. Dominating the center is a high-quality product image ("product_image"), made prominent with strategic placement and scaling. At the top, a bold headline ("heading") delivers the main branding message in a futuristic typeface, followed by a subheading ("subheading") in a slightly smaller but bold font, detailing the product type. Near the bottom, pricing information ("price") is clearly highlighted, and a prominent call-to-action button ("cta_background" and "cta") encourages user interaction. 

**Color Palette:**
- Light Sky Blue: #E8EFF2
- Soft Blue: #D6E6EE
- Muted Steel Blue: #C5DBE6
- Slate Blue: #B0CCD9
- Mild Cerulean: #A5C3D3
- Deep Teal: #2B4D5C
- Rich Navy Blue: #3A6478
- White: #FFFFFF
product_color: The product image features a sleek, modern dryer dominated by a monochromatic color scheme. Primarily, it uses crisp white (#FFFFFF) as the base for the body, giving it a clean and contemporary aesthetic. The door and display areas are in glossy black (#1A1A1A), providing bold contrast and drawing attention to key functional parts. The display screen glows with digital blue (#00BFFF) and white text, enhancing readability and highlighting technology. Subtle accents of red (#FF4136) and blue (#0074D9) around the control knob add visual interest. These colors blend harmoniously by using white space to frame and emphasize darker and colored elements effortlessly.
